impactR4PHU 0.1.0
  • Reference

    check_fsl_flags

    check_fsl_flags.Rd

    check_fsl_flags

    Usage

    check_fsl_flags(
  .dataset,
  fcs_cereal = "fsl_fcs_cereal",
  fcs_legumes = "fsl_fcs_legumes",
  fcs_dairy = "fsl_fcs_dairy",
  fcs_meat = "fsl_fcs_meat",
  fcs_veg = "fsl_fcs_veg",
  fcs_fruit = "fsl_fcs_fruit",
  fcs_oil = "fsl_fcs_oil",
  fcs_sugar = "fsl_fcs_sugar",
  rcsi_lessquality = "fsl_rcsi_lessquality",
  rcsi_borrow = "fsl_rcsi_borrow",
  rcsi_mealsize = "fsl_rcsi_mealsize",
  rcsi_mealadult = "fsl_rcsi_mealadult",
  rcsi_mealnb = "fsl_rcsi_mealnb",
  hhs_nofoodhh = "fsl_hhs_nofoodhh",
  hhs_nofoodhh_freq = "fsl_hhs_nofoodhh_freq",
  hhs_sleephungry = "fsl_hhs_sleephungry",
  hhs_sleephungry_freq = "fsl_hhs_sleephungry_freq",
  hhs_alldaynight = "fsl_hhs_alldaynight",
  hhs_alldaynight_freq = "fsl_hhs_alldaynight_freq",
  hdds_cereals = "fsl_hdds_cereals",
  hdds_tubers = "fsl_hdds_tubers",
  hdds_legumes = "fsl_hdds_legumes",
  hdds_veg = "fsl_hdds_veg",
  hdds_fruit = "fsl_hdds_fruit",
  hdds_meat = "fsl_hdds_meat",
  hdds_fish = "fsl_hdds_fish",
  hdds_dairy = "fsl_hdds_dairy",
  hdds_eggs = "fsl_hdds_eggs",
  hdds_sugar = "fsl_hdds_sugar",
  hdds_oil = "fsl_hdds_oil",
  hdds_condiments = "fsl_hdds_condiments",
  lcsi_stress1 = "fsl_lcsi_stress1",
  lcsi_stress2 = "fsl_lcsi_stress2",
  lcsi_stress3 = "fsl_lcsi_stress3",
  lcsi_stress4 = "fsl_lcsi_stress4",
  lcsi_crisis1 = "fsl_lcsi_crisis1",
  lcsi_crisis2 = "fsl_lcsi_crisis2",
  lcsi_crisis3 = "fsl_lcsi_crisis3",
  lcsi_emergency1 = "fsl_lcsi_emergency1",
  lcsi_emergency2 = "fsl_lcsi_emergency2",
  lcsi_emergency3 = "fsl_lcsi_emergency3",
  lcsi_stress = "fsl_lcsi_stress",
  lcsi_crisis = "fsl_lcsi_crisis",
  lcsi_emergency = "fsl_lcsi_emergency",
  lcsi_cat_yes = "fsl_lcsi_cat_yes",
  lcsi_cat_exhaust = "fsl_lcsi_cat_exhaust",
  lcsi_cat = "fsl_lcsi_cat",
  fcs_cat = "fsl_fcs_cat",
  fcs_score = "fsl_fcs_score",
  rcsi_cat = "fsl_rcsi_cat",
  rcsi_score = "fsl_rcsi_score",
  hhs_cat = "fsl_hhs_cat",
  hhs_score = "fsl_hhs_score",
  hdds_cat = "fsl_hdds_cat",
  hdds_score = "fsl_hdds_score",
  fc_cell = "fc_cell",
  fc_phase = "fc_phase",
  num_children = "num_children",
  income_types = c("fsl_first_income_types", "fsl_second_income_types",
    "fsl_third_income_types"),
  residency_status = "residency_status",
  value_idp = "idp",
  grouping = NULL,
  tool.survey = NULL,
  uuid = "uuid"
)

    Arguments

    .dataset

    the raw dataset with all add_x indicators functions called in

    fcs_cereal

    the name of the variable that indicates the number of days cereals were consumed

    fcs_legumes

    the name of the variable that indicates the number of days legumes were consumed

    fcs_dairy

    the name of the variable that indicates the number of days dairy were consumed

    fcs_meat

    the name of the variable that indicates the number of days meat were consumed

    fcs_veg

    the name of the variable that indicates the number of days vegetables were consumed

    fcs_fruit

    the name of the variable that indicates the number of days fruit were consumed

    fcs_oil

    the name of the variable that indicates the number of days oil was consumed

    fcs_sugar

    the name of the variable that indicates the number of days sugar was consumed

    rcsi_lessquality

    Column representing question- During the last 7 days, were there days (and, if so, how many) when your household had to rely on less preferred and less expensive food to cope with a lack of food or money to buy it?

    rcsi_borrow

    Column representing question- During the last 7 days, were there days (and, if so, how many) when your household had to borrow food or rely on help from a relative or friend to cope with a lack of food or money to buy it?

    rcsi_mealsize

    Column representing question- During the last 7 days, were there days (and, if so, how many) when your household had to limit portion size of meals at meal times to cope with a lack of food or money to buy it?

    rcsi_mealadult

    Column representing question- During the last 7 days, were there days (and, if so, how many) when your household had to restrict consumption by adults in order for small children to eat to cope with a lack of food or money to buy it?

    rcsi_mealnb

    Column representing question - During the last 7 days, were there days (and, if so, how many) when your household had to reduce number of meals eaten in a day to cope with a lack of food or money to buy it?

    hhs_nofoodhh

    The name of the column "In the past 4 weeks (30 days), was there ever no food to eat of any kind in your house because of lack of resources to get food?". It has to be a string.

    hhs_nofoodhh_freq

    The name of the column "How often did this happen in the past (4 weeks/30 days)?". It has to be a string.

    hhs_sleephungry

    The name of the column "In the past 4 weeks (30 days), did you or any household member go to sleep at night hungry because there was not enough food?". It has to be a string.

    hhs_sleephungry_freq

    The name of the column "How often did this happen in the past (4 weeks/30 days)?". It has to be a string.

    hhs_alldaynight

    The name of the column "In the past 4 weeks (30 days), did you or any household member go a whole day and night without eating anything at all because there was not enough food?". It has to be a string.

    hhs_alldaynight_freq

    The name of the column "How often did this happen in the past (4 weeks/30 days)?". It has to be a string.

    hdds_cereals

    the name of the variable that indicates if cereals were consumed in the last 24 hours

    hdds_tubers

    the name of the variable that indicates if roots or tubers were consumed in the last 24 hours

    hdds_legumes

    the name of the variable that indicates if pulses or legumes were consumed in the last 24 hours

    hdds_veg

    the name of the variable that indicates if vegetables were consumed in the last 24 hours

    hdds_fruit

    the name of the variable that indicates if fruit were consumed in the last 24 hours

    hdds_meat

    the name of the variable that indicates if meat were consumed in the last 24 hours

    hdds_fish

    the name of the variable that indicates if fish were consumed in the last 24 hours

    hdds_dairy

    the name of the variable that indicates if dairy were consumed in the last 24 hours

    hdds_eggs

    the name of the variable that indicates if eggs were consumed in the last 24 hours

    hdds_sugar

    the name of the variable that indicates if sugar were consumed in the last 24 hours

    hdds_oil

    the name of the variable that indicates if oil was consumed in the last 24 hours

    hdds_condiments

    the name of the variable that indicates if condiments were consumed in the last 24 hours

    lcsi_stress1

    the name of the variable that indicates the first stress LCSI strategy

    lcsi_stress2

    the name of the variable that indicates the second stress LCSI strategy

    lcsi_stress3

    the name of the variable that indicates the third stress LCSI strategy

    lcsi_stress4

    the name of the variable that indicates the fourth stress LCSI strategy

    lcsi_crisis1

    the name of the variable that indicates the first crisis LCSI strategy

    lcsi_crisis2

    the name of the variable that indicates the second crisis LCSI strategy

    lcsi_crisis3

    the name of the variable that indicates the third crisis LCSI strategy

    lcsi_emergency1

    the name of the variable that indicates the first emergency LCSI strategy

    lcsi_emergency2

    the name of the variable that indicates the second emergency LCSI strategy

    lcsi_emergency3

    the name of the variable that indicates the third emergency LCSI strategy

    lcsi_stress

    the name of the variable that indicates the calculation of the stress LCSI strategy

    lcsi_crisis

    the name of the variable that indicates the calculation of the crisis LCSI strategy

    lcsi_emergency

    the name of the variable that indicates the calculation of the stress LCSI strategy

    lcsi_cat_yes

    the name of the variable that indicates the highest category of the LCSI strategy used yes

    lcsi_cat_exhaust

    the name of the variable that indicates the highest category of the LCSI strategy used exhaustively

    lcsi_cat

    the name of the variable that indicates the highest category of the LCSI strategy

    fcs_cat

    the name of the variable that indicates the food consumption score category

    fcs_score

    the name of the variable that indicates the food consumption score

    rcsi_cat

    the name of the variable that indicates the reduced coping strategy index category

    rcsi_score

    the name of the variable that indicates the reduced coping strategy index score

    hhs_cat

    the name of the variable that indicates the household hunger scale category

    hhs_score

    the name of the variable that indicates the household hunger scale score

    hdds_cat

    the name of the variable that indicates the household dietary diversity score category

    hdds_score

    the name of the variable that indicates the household dietary diversity score

    fc_cell

    the name of the variable that indicates the food consumption matrix score

    fc_phase

    the name of the variable that indicates the food consumption matrix phase

    num_children

    the name of the variable that indicates the number of children available in each household

    income_types

    a vector of the three income_types variables. By default, c("fsl_first_income_types","fsl_second_income_types","fsl_third_income_types")

    residency_status

    the name of the variable that indicates the residency status of HH, By default, "residency_status"

    value_idp

    the name of the choice value representing the idp residency status. By default, "idp"

    grouping

    the name of the variable that indicates the grouping variable - usually "enumerator"

    tool.survey

    This is the tool.survey dataset. By default NULL

    uuid

    uuid variable

    Value

    a dataframe that includes all the logical flags related to food security and livelihoods. This includes: - flag_meat_cereal_ratio - flag_low_cereal - flag_low_fcs - flag_high_fcs - flag_low_oil - flag_sd_foodgroup - flag_protein_rcsi - flag_fcs_rcsi - flag_high_rcsi - flag_rcsi_children - flag_fcsrcsi_box - flag_sd_rcsicoping - flag_severe_hhs - flag_lcsi_coherence - flag_lcsi_severity - flag_lcsi_na - flag_lcsi_liv_agriculture - flag_lcsi_liv_livestock - flag_lcsi_displ - flag_fc_cell - flag_low_sugar_cond_hdds

    Examples

    tool.survey <- impactR4PHU_survey_template
df <- data.frame(
  fsl_fcs_cereal = c(1, 4),
  fsl_fcs_legumes = c(3, 3),
  fsl_fcs_dairy = c(1, 6),
  fsl_fcs_meat = c(2, 3),
  fsl_fcs_veg = c(5, 4),
  fsl_fcs_fruit = c(1, 4),
  fsl_fcs_oil = c(1, 4),
  fsl_fcs_sugar = c(6, 2),
  fsl_rcsi_lessquality = c(2,4),
  fsl_rcsi_borrow = c(1,4),
  fsl_rcsi_mealsize = c(4,5),
  fsl_rcsi_mealadult = c(2,4),
  fsl_rcsi_mealnb = c(3,2),
  fsl_hhs_nofoodhh = c("yes","no"),
  fsl_hhs_nofoodhh_freq = c("rarely", NA),
  fsl_hhs_sleephungry= c("no","no"),
  fsl_hhs_sleephungry_freq = c(NA, NA),
  fsl_hhs_alldaynight= c("no","yes"),
  fsl_hhs_alldaynight_freq = c(NA, "often"),
  fsl_hdds_cereals = c("yes","no"),
  fsl_hdds_tubers = c("yes","no"),
  fsl_hdds_legumes = c("yes","no"),
  fsl_hdds_veg = c("no","no"),
  fsl_hdds_fruit = c("yes","no"),
  fsl_hdds_meat = c("yes","no"),
  fsl_hdds_fish = c("yes","no"),
  fsl_hdds_dairy = c("no","no"),
  fsl_hdds_eggs = c("yes","no"),
  fsl_hdds_sugar = c("yes","no"),
  fsl_hdds_oil = c("yes","no"),
  fsl_hdds_condiments = c("yes","no"),
  fsl_lcsi_stress1 = c("not_applicable","yes"),
  fsl_lcsi_stress2 = c("no_had_no_need","not_applicable"),
  fsl_lcsi_stress3 = c("not_applicable","yes"),
  fsl_lcsi_stress4 = c("no_exhausted","yes"),
  fsl_lcsi_crisis1 = c("no_exhausted","yes"),
  fsl_lcsi_crisis2 = c("no_had_no_need","yes"),
  fsl_lcsi_crisis3 = c("no_had_no_need","yes"),
  fsl_lcsi_emergency1 = c("no_had_no_need","yes"),
  fsl_lcsi_emergency2 = c("not_applicable","no_exhausted"),
  fsl_lcsi_emergency3 = c("not_applicable","yes"),
  fsl_lcsi_stress = c(1, 1),
  fsl_lcsi_crisis = c(1, 1),
  fsl_lcsi_emergency = c(0, 1),
  fsl_lcsi_cat_yes = c("None","Emergency"),
  fsl_lcsi_cat_exhaust = c("Crisis","Emergency"),
  fsl_lcsi_cat = c("Crisis","Emergency"),
  fsl_fcs_cat = c("Borderline","Acceptable"),
  fsl_fcs_score = c(32.5,64.0),
  fsl_rcsi_cat= c("Medium","High"),
  fsl_rcsi_score= c(17,31),
  fsl_hhs_cat= c("No or Little","Moderate"),
  fsl_hhs_score= c(1,2),
  fsl_hdds_cat= c("High","Low"),
  fsl_hdds_score= c(10,0),
  fc_cell= c(22,33),
  fc_phase= c("Phase 2 FC","Phase 3 FC"),
  num_children= c(2,3),
  fsl_first_income_types = c("sell_agri_prod","trader"),
  fsl_second_income_types = c("daily_labour_skilled","sell_anim_prod"),
  fsl_third_income_types = c("hum_assistance","none"),
  residency_status = c("idp", "host"),
  enumerator = c("team1","team2"),
  uuid= c("31d0cfb8-21d7-414b4f-94999f-04a15ce39d78","205d37b1-5a6f-44484d-b3b1ba-4eafbdc50873")
  )

check_fsl_flags(.dataset = df, grouping = "enumerator", tool.survey = tool.survey)
#>                                       uuid group fsl_fcs_cereal fsl_fcs_legumes
#> 1 31d0cfb8-21d7-414b4f-94999f-04a15ce39d78 team1              1               3
#> 2 205d37b1-5a6f-44484d-b3b1ba-4eafbdc50873 team2              4               3
#>   fsl_fcs_dairy fsl_fcs_meat fsl_fcs_veg fsl_fcs_fruit fsl_fcs_oil
#> 1             1            2           5             1           1
#> 2             6            3           4             4           4
#>   fsl_fcs_sugar fsl_fcs_score fsl_fcs_cat flag_meat_cereal_ratio
#> 1             6          32.5  Borderline                      1
#> 2             2          64.0  Acceptable                      0
#>   flag_low_cereal flag_low_oil flag_low_fcs flag_high_fcs flag_sd_foodgroup
#> 1               1            1            0             0                NA
#> 2               1            1            0             1                NA
#>   fsl_rcsi_lessquality fsl_rcsi_borrow fsl_rcsi_mealsize fsl_rcsi_mealadult
#> 1                    2               1                 4                  2
#> 2                    4               4                 5                  4
#>   fsl_rcsi_mealnb fsl_rcsi_score fsl_rcsi_cat flag_protein_rcsi flag_fcs_rcsi

#> 2               2             31         High                 1             0

#> 2              0                  0                1                 NA

#> 1              yes                rarely                  no

#> 1                       NA                  no                     <NA>
#> 2                       NA                 yes                    often

#> 2             2     Moderate               0              yes   not_applicable

#> 1   not_applicable     no_exhausted     no_exhausted   no_had_no_need
#> 2              yes              yes              yes              yes
#>   fsl_lcsi_crisis3 fsl_lcsi_emergency1 fsl_lcsi_emergency2 fsl_lcsi_emergency3
#> 1   no_had_no_need      no_had_no_need      not_applicable      not_applicable
#> 2              yes                 yes        no_exhausted                 yes
#>   fsl_lcsi_stress fsl_lcsi_crisis fsl_lcsi_emergency fsl_lcsi_cat_yes
#> 1               1               1                  0             None
#> 2               1               1                  1        Emergency

#> 1               Crisis       Crisis                   0                 NA
#> 2            Emergency    Emergency                   0                  1
#>   flag_lcsi_na flag_lcsi_liv_livestock flag_lcsi_liv_agriculture
#> 1           NA                      NA                        NA
#> 2           NA                      NA                         1
#>   flag_lcsi_displ fc_cell   fc_phase flag_fc_cell fsl_hdds_cereals
#> 1              NA      22 Phase 2 FC            0              yes
#> 2              NA      33 Phase 3 FC            0               no
#>   fsl_hdds_tubers fsl_hdds_legumes fsl_hdds_veg fsl_hdds_fruit fsl_hdds_meat
#> 1             yes              yes           no            yes           yes
#> 2              no               no           no             no            no
#>   fsl_hdds_fish fsl_hdds_dairy fsl_hdds_eggs fsl_hdds_sugar fsl_hdds_oil
#> 1           yes             no           yes            yes          yes
#> 2            no             no            no             no           no
#>   fsl_hdds_condiments fsl_hdds_cat fsl_hdds_score flag_low_sugar_cond_hdds

#> 2                  no          Low              0                        0
